def_cn: 聪明的;聪颖的;智商高的
def_en: Someone who is clever is intelligent and able to understand things easily or plan things well.

def_cn: (观点、书、发明)巧妙的，绝妙的
def_en: A clever idea, book, or invention is extremely effective and shows the skill of the people involved.

def_cn: 聪明过头的;过分聪明的
def_en: If someone is too clever by half, they are very clever and they show their cleverness in a way that annoys other people.
